22156.「……お前は まだ\n そんなことを言ってるのか。: You're still talking like that, aren't you?

22158.「アーニア よく聞け。\n お前の修練の成果や 実力を かんがみて\n 次の研究:
Anya, listen to me. In light of your training
and your ability, if you fail to produce
results in your next presentation...

22159.「お前を この研究院から\n 追放することが 決定した。:
It has been decided that you will be expelled
from this institute.

22161.「研究院会議の総意だ。\n くつがえりは しない。:
It's the consensus of the Institute. It will
not be overturned.

22162.「……努力する者は 支援する。\n だが 個人的 かつ 感傷的な理由で\n 歩み:
...We support those who make an effort. But we
do not need those who stop for personal and
sentimental reasons.

22163.「アーニア……。お前は 神に見放されず\n 大病から 奇跡的に 回復したのだ。\:
Anya... you have miraculously recovered from a
serious illness that God didn't give up on
you. Think about what you have to do.

22164.<if_woman>「おかげさまで 無事に ここまで来れたわ。\n ありがとね:
Thanks for getting me here in one piece
<cs_pchero>.

22165.「ここ 前に シェリルと来たことがあったの。\n だから もしかして……って思っ:
I had been here before with Cheryl. So I
thought maybe... but I knew he couldn't be
here.

22166.<if_woman>「とりあえず 研究用の素材を 採ってくるね。\n <cs_p:
In the meantime, I'm going to get some
materials for my research. <cs_pchero> wait
there.

22168.<if_woman>「<cs_pchero>ちゃん お願い！\n このオバケを:
Please <cs_pchero>! Do something about this
monster!

22169.<if_woman>「おかげさまで 無事に ここまで来れたわ。\n ありがとね:
Thanks for getting me here in one piece
<cs_pchero>.

22170.「あのオバケ 今日は いないようね……。\n お留守にしてるのかな？:
That old fart doesn't seem to be around
today... or maybe he's just not home.

22172.<if_woman>「<cs_pchero>ちゃん お願い！\n このオバケを:
Please <cs_pchero>! Do something about this
monster!

22173.<if_woman>「すごい！ すごい！\n <cs_pchero>ちゃん 強ー:
Wow! That's great! <cs_pchero> you're so
strong! Thank you so much!

22174.<if_woman>「それじゃ 私は 研究用の素材を探してくるね。\n <cs_:
Well then, I'll go look for some research
material. <cs_pchero> wait there.

22175.<if_woman>「<cs_pchero>ちゃん 見て！\n 研究素材の鉱石が:
<cs_pchero> look! I found some ore for
research!

22178.「……死相が出ていると 言っただろう。\n 人の忠告は ちゃんと聞くんだな。:
I told you he was dying. You should listen to
people's advice.

22179.「シェリル！ どうして ここへ！？: Cheryl! How did you get in here?

22180.「お前が 研究院を追放されると聞いて\n いやみのひとつでも 言ってやろうと思っ:
When I heard that you were going to be
expelled from the institute, I thought I would
express my dissatisfaction.

22181.「……私も あなたに言いたいことがあるわ！: I have something to say to you too!

22182.「王立研究院の門を たたいたとき\n 一緒に 大賢者になろうって誓った……\n:
When we knocked on the door of the Royal
Academy, we swore that we would become great
sages together... did you forget that promise?

22183.「私は…… のろまで グズで バカで\n なんのとりえもない ただの落ちこぼれだ:
I'm a slow, lazy, stupid, hopeless failure,
but you're far more... Stupid!

22184.「自分の 恵まれた才能を活かさず\n ふらふら 遊んでばっかり……！\n 私みた:
All you do is to play around and not use your
talent! Have you ever thought about people
like me?

22186.「お前の 戯言など聞きたくない！！\n 出来の悪い 愚者のお前に 何がわかる！？:
I don't want to hear any more of your nonsense! You're a bad, bad Fool, and what do you know about it? How could you possibly know
what I'm going through?

22187.「……それとも お前は\n 今でも 自分が 大賢者になれると\n 本気で思ってい:
...Or do you still really think you can be the
Great Sage?

22188.「なれるよ。私は 絶対になる。\n ふたりで夢見た 大賢者に……！:
I can be. I will definitely become. The great
sage we both dreamed of...!

22189.「ふっ 笑わせてくれる……。\n お前は 大賢者になど なれん。\n かなわぬ夢:
You will never be a great sage. Your
unfulfilled dreams are hollow.

22190.「早々に あきらめろ。\n 忠告だけは しておいてやる。:
Give it up as soon as you can. I'll give you
some advice.

22191.「シェリル……！\n 私は あなたのこと 待ってるから\n いつでも 王立研究院:
Cheryl...! I'll be waiting for you, so come
back to the Royal Academy whenever you want!

22192.「シェリルは 意志の強いコだったけど\n あんな 冷たいコじゃなかったわ……。\:
Cheryl was a strong-willed girl, but she was
never that cold... why on earth would she...

22193.<if_woman>「ごめんね <cs_pchero>ちゃん。\n 変なとこ 見:
Sorry <cs_pchero>. I'm sorry I showed you
something weird... Now let's go back to the
Royal Research, shall we?
